import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { data = {}; email !: string; password !: string; loginUser(){ alert(this.email ); } }
